metadata.title: CVE-2017-7377 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The (1) v9fs_create and (2) v9fs_lcreate functions in hw/9pfs/9p.c in QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) allow local guest OS privileged users to cause a denial of service (file descriptor or memory consumption) via vectors related to an already in-use fid.

notes.note: tyhicks> A privileged user in the guest can leak host memory Affected code is in hw/9pfs/virtio-9p.c in older releases

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.8+dfsg-3ubuntu3').
